entry.title: Whatever happened to Jeff Pringle?
entry.summary: Jeff Pringle, the Geordie schoolteacher, is mysteriously absent from Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service, though his son Charlie is still featured. In his place there is a new teacher Lauren Taylor. The fact that Jeff is never even spoken about kind of indicates that perhaps something unspeakable happened.
entry.content:
Jeff Pringle, the Geordie schoolteacher, is mysteriously absent from Postman Pat: Special Delivery Service, though his son Charlie is still featured. In his place there is a new teacher Lauren Taylor.

The fact that Jeff is never even spoken about kind of indicates that perhaps something unspeakable happened.
